title: Itâ€™s Never Too Late to Pivot From N.F.L. Safety to Neurosurgeon
description: When Myron Rolle was cut from the Pittsburgh Steelers, he fell into a funk until his mother reminded him of his two childhood dreams: Play football, then become a neurosurgeon. It was time for Plan B.
dc:creator: Elena Bergeron
media:credit: Ryan Christopher Jones for The New York Times
media:description: Dr. Myron Rolle became a neurosurgeon at Massachusetts General Hospital after his football glory days ended.
